Sentencas: Gadolinium-doped cerium oxide (Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a; CGO) and strontium-doped lanthanum ferrite (La0.6Sr0.4FeO3; LSF) are well-known compounds for their application in solid oxide fuel cells, dense oxygen permeable membrane, and high-temperature ceramic reactor.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: The superior electro-catalytic performance of these two individual oxides or their composites is well established as it originates from multivalent cations (Ce3+/4+ and Fe2+/3+/4+) and doping-induced defects like electrons, holes, and oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: This work focuses on synthesizing and characterizing composite taking CGO and LSF in different weight ratios, i.e., 10:90, 30:70, 50:50, 70:30, and 90:10 by sol-gel auto-combustion process.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: End members CGO and LSF were also synthesized for comparison purposes.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: All synthesized nanopowders (single phases and their composites) were characterized with X-ray diffraction (XRD) for phase identification and Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) for elemental composition analysis.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: XRD and SEM results established the formation of the required phase and targeted composition.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: The optical properties of the materials were evaluated with the help of ultraviolet-visible Diffuse Reflectance Spectroscopy (UV-Vis DRS).
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: Tauc's approximation measured band gap energies, and all the composites showed a very high band gap in the 4.85-5 eV range.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: Magnetic properties such as saturation magnetization (Ms), remanence (Mr), and coercive force (Hc) were calculated from a magnetic hysteresis loop obtained from the Vibratingsample magnetometer (VSM) experiment at room temperature.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: Furthermore, the law of approach to saturation (LAS) model was applied to more precisely calculate Ms and other essential parameters.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: In magnetic characterization, the LSF phase fraction controls the overall magnetic property of the composites.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: Electrochemical behavior, such as the composites' charge storage ability and stability were tested by cyclic voltammetry and chronopotentiometry method.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route

Sentencas: All the samples exhibited good stability, and the highest specific capacitance of 26 F/gm was obtained for the composite sample (CL91) when only 10 % LSF phase was incorporated in the nanocomposite.
Titulo: Optical, magnetic, and electrochemical properties of a fluorite-perovskite Ce0.9Gd0.1O2-a-La0.6Sr0.4FeO3-a nanocomposite synthesized by one pot sol-gel auto-combustion route
